name: cph-tio-runner
description: Fork of Competitive Programming Helper wired to tio.run so it can live alongside the original extension.

cphTio.general.saveLocation.description: Location where generated .tcs and .bin files will be saved. Leave empty to save the file in the source file directory. Use this to clean up your folders.

cphTio.general.timeOut.description: The time in ms for which a testcase is run before it is killed ( timed-out ).

cphTio.general.hideStderrorWhenCompiledO.description: Ignore and don't show stderror when compilation exit code is zero.

cphTio.general.ignoreSTDERROR.description: If enabled, non-empty standard error will not result in testcase failing.

cphTio.language.c.Args.title: Compilation flags for .c files
cphTio.language.c.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to gcc ( for C ) while compiling your file. Example '-O2 -Wall'

cphTio.language.c.SubmissionCompiler.description: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for c

cphTio.language.c.Command.description: Command used to compile .c files. Example 'gcc', 'gcc-10', 'clang', 'msvc', etc.

cphTio.language.c.OutputArg.description: C compiler's argument that specifies the output files.

cphTio.language.cpp.Args.title: Compilation flags for .cpp files
cphTio.language.cpp.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to g++ ( for C++ ) while compiling your file. Example '-Wmaybe-uninitialized -std=c++14'

cphTio.language.cpp.SubmissionCompiler.title: check12344566
cphTio.language.cpp.SubmissionCompiler.description: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for cpp

cphTio.language.cpp.Command.description: Command used to compile .cpp files. Example 'g++', 'g++-10', 'clang++', etc.

cphTio.language.cpp.OutputArg.description: C++ compiler's argument that specifies the output files.

cphTio.language.csharp.Args.title: Compilation flags for .cs files
cphTio.language.csharp.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to dotnet while compiling your file.

cphTio.language.csharp.SubmissionCompile.description: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for C#

cphTio.language.csharp.Command.description: Command used to compile .cs files. 'dotnet' for C# .NET, 'mcs' for C# Mono

cphTio.language.python.Args.title: Compilation flags for Python
cphTio.language.python.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to python while compiling your file. Example '-Wignore -u'

cphTio.language.python.SubmissionCompile.description: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for python

cphTio.language.python.Command.description: Command used to run python files. Example 'py', 'python3', 'pypy3', etc.

cphTio.language.ruby.Args.title: Compilation flags for ruby
cphTio.language.ruby.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to ruby while compiling your file.

cphTio.language.ruby.SubmissionCompiler.description: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for python

cphTio.language.ruby.Command.description: Command used to run ruby files.

cphTio.language.rust.Args.title: Compilation flags for Rust
cphTio.language.rust.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to rustc while compiling your file. Example '-O2 --verbose'

cphTio.language.rust.SubmissionCompiler.description: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for rust

cphTio.language.rust.Command.description: Command used to compile rust files.

cphTio.language.go.Args.title: Compilation flags for .go files
cphTio.language.go.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to go while compiling your file. Example '-gcflags=-S'

cphTio.language.go.SubmissionCompiler.description: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for go

cphTio.language.haskell.Args.title: Compilation flags for .hs files
cphTio.language.haskell.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to go while compiling your file.

cphTio.language.haskell.SubmissionCompil.description: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for haskell

cphTio.language.java.Args.title: Compilation flags for Java
cphTio.language.java.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to javac while compiling your file. Example '-verbose'

cphTio.language.java.SubmissionCompiler.description: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for java

cphTio.language.java.Command.description: Command used to compile java files.

cphTio.language.js.Args.title: Compilation flags for JavaScript
cphTio.language.js.Args.description: Space seperated additional flags passed to node (for JavaScript) while compiling your file. Example '--abort-on-uncaught-exception'

cphTio.language.js.SubmissionCompiler.description: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for js

cphTio.general.firstTime.title: Show welcome message
cphTio.general.firstTime.description: A welcome message is shown when you run a testcase for the first time. This setting is updated automatically after the first message is shown.

cphTio.general.defaultLanguage.title: Default language for new problems
cphTio.general.defaultLanguage.description: Provide a tio.js language id (e.g. "python3", "cpp-gcc") to always use that runtime for new problems. Use "none" to keep prompting for a language.

cphTio.general.menuChoices.default: cpp java js python c rust ruby csharp go haskell
cphTio.general.menuChoices.description: Space separated languages, in top to bottom order, shown in menu when a problem is imported via Competitive Companion. Example 'java python' would show java on top, followed by python.

cphTio.general.useShortCodeForcesName.description: Use a short ID for problem file generated ( like 144C ) instead of the complete problem name for codeforces problems

cphTio.general.useShortLuoguName.description: Use a short ID for problem file generated ( like P1145 / U123456 ) instead of the complete problem name for luogu problems

cphTio.general.useShortAtCoderName.description: Use a short ID for problem file generated ( like abc123a ) instead of the complete problem name for atcoder problems

cphTio.general.retainWebviewContext.description: Keep the webview active even when it's hidden. May improve performance but may cause some rendering issues.

cphTio.general.defaultLanguageTemplateFi.description: The path to the template file that will be used when creating a new file for the default language via Competitive Companion. For Java templates, use 'CLASS_NAME' as a placeholder for the class name like 'class CLASS_NAME{...}'

cphTio.general.autoShowJudge.description: Automatically show the judge view when opening a file that has a problem associated with it

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run webpack-frontend-production && npm run webpack-production
